mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bet WHERE WINNER_INDICATOR IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bet WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND WINNER_INDICATOR = '1'

SELECT b.tstamp as tstamp, b.odd as total_odd, b.points as points, b.prize as points_to_win, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BET_FIXTURES bf WHERE bf.bet_id = b.bet_id) as count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BET_FIXTURES bf WHERE bf.bet_id = b.bet_id AND bf.correct = '1') as winning_bets FROM bet b WHERE WINNER_INDICATOR IS NULL

SELECT b.tstamp as tstamp, b.odd as total_odd, b.points as points, b.prize as points_to_win, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BET_FIXTURES bf WHERE bf.bet_id = b.bet_id) as count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BET_FIXTURES bf WHERE bf.bet_id = b.bet_id AND bf.correct = '1') as winning_bets FROM bet b WHERE WINNER_INDICATOR IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tstamp desc LIMIT #{betCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE bet SET USER_ID = #{bet.userId}, POINTS = #{bet.points}, PRIZE = #{bet.prize}, ODD = #{bet.odd}, WINNER_INDICATOR = #{bet.winnerIndicator}, TSTAMP = #{bet.tstamp} WHERE BET_ID = #{bet.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bet (USER_ID, POINTS, PRIZE, ODD, WINNER_INDICATOR, TSTAMP ) VALUES (#{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{points, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prize, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{odd, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{winnerIndicator, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tstamp, jdbcType=DATE})
